subject: Athletics and Sports
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan had 30 points and 11 rebounds, Manu Ginóbili made a layup with 36.5 seconds left, and the visiting San Antonio Spurs rallied from a 10-point second-half deficit to beat the Miami Heat, 90-89, Thursday night.
snippet: Tim Duncan had 30 points and 11 rebounds, Manu Ginóbili made a layup with 36.5 seconds left, and the visiting San Antonio Spurs rallied from a 10-point second-half deficit to beat the Miami Heat, 90-89, Thursday night.
